name: Agila 2 - Unity HDRP Version
description:
DESCRIPTION:

 The Philippine eagle (Pithecophaga jefferyi) is the national bird of the Philippines but is already declared as critically endangered. A major factor for this problem is poaching. This game hopes to raise awareness on the issue.

This version is the improved version of the Unreal build. Agila was completely revamped and built using unity HDRP.

CREDITS:

PROGRAMMERS:

Jan Carlo San Juan

Gian Mauricio

Jacob Lo

Artists:

Gian Collantes

Jed Hilomen

How to play:

The game uses the following for inputs:

WASD: Movement

Mouse drag: View

Keyboard 'I' : Inventory

Mouse left click: Interact

Shift: boost

Objectives:

Avoid the poacher's projectiles. Collect items around the world. Destroy bird cages.
